properties.areaDesc: Waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 2:45AM EST until January 4 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
seas around 4 feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL from
20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until at least Saturday evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

A sudden onset of rough seas may cause hazardous conditions,
which may occur suddenly at jetties and inlets. These conditions
could catch boaters by surprise. Boaters should use caution when
entering or exiting the inlets and jetty areas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY
